PropertyValue.Value: select blii.line_name,bsi.station_cn_name,tsi.tick_mana_type,decode(btmt.tick_mana_type_name,null,tv.tick_mana_type_name,btmt.tick_mana_type_name)tick_mana_type_name,case tsi.ticket_status when '00' then '正常'when '01' then '废票'end ticket_status,tsi.in_store_num,tsi.total_num,tsi.update_date,tsi.update_time from tick_storage_history_info tsi left join basi_line_id_info blii on blii.line_id = tsi.line_id left join basi_station_info bsi on bsi.station_id = tsi.station_id left join basi_tick_mana_type_info btmt on btmt.tick_mana_type = tsi.tick_mana_type left join tick_valued_product_info tv on tv.tick_mana_type=tsi.Tick_Mana_Type
